testcase.classname: Amazon application end to end test cases
testcase.name: User verifies login functionality of the application
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the chrome browser........................................passed When User hit the amazon application........................................passed And User mouse over the show by category menu...............................passed And User mouse over the mobile,application menu.............................passed And User mouse over the subcategory powerbank...............................passed And User click the subcategory powerbank....................................passed And User click the powerbank image..........................................passed And User click the powerbank item...........................................passed And User click the Add to cart..............................................passed And User click the cart.....................................................passed Then User checkout the item.................................................passed
